After Purchase_in-app_or_online , the next U.S. consumer are Made_a_mobile_payment at 64 degrees , followed by Sent_money_internationally at 18 degrees , Paid_a_bill at 49 degrees and then Received_loyalty_points at 26 degrees .
gold: This statistic gives information on the U.S. consumer usage of mobile payment offerings as of January 2017 . During a survey of smartphone owners , 49 percent of respondents stated they had paid a bill via mobile .
